Question: You receive your first credit card bill. Do you want to pay in full, pay the minimum, or make a partial payment?

Pay in full.Text: Make the whole payment right now.

Pay minimum.Text: Make only the minimum payment required.

Partial Payment.Text: Make a partial payment that's less than the minimum.

Question: You see an item you want on sale but don't have enough saved. Do you charge it to your card?

Yes.Text: Charge the item to your credit card.

No.Text: Skip buying the item for now.

Question: You receive a credit limit increase offer. Do you accept it?

Accept.Text: Accept the offer to increase your credit limit.

Decline.Text: Decline the offer and keep your current limit.

Question: You're invited to a rewards program challenge: Spend $500 on travel for bonus points. Do you accept?

Accept.Text: Take the challenge and spend $500 for bonus rewards points.

Decline.Text: Skip the challenge and avoid the additional spending.

Question: You're faced with an emergency expense (car repair, medical bill, etc.). Do you use your credit card, dip into savings, or set up a payment plan?

Use Credit Card.Text: Cover the expense by charging it to your credit card.

Use Savings.Text: Pay for the expense using your savings.

Set Up Payment Plan.Text: Arrange a payment plan to cover the expense over time.

Question: You get a promotion and raise at work. Do you increase your monthly payments, build savings, or splurge on something new?

Increase Payments.Text: Use the extra income to increase your monthly credit payments.

Build Savings.Text: Save the extra income for future expenses.

Splurge.Text: Spend the extra income on something special for yourself.

Question: You're offered a balance transfer option with a 0% intro rate for 12 months. Do you transfer your balance?

Accept.Text: Transfer your balance to take advantage of the lower interest rate.

Decline.Text: Stick with your current credit card and interest rate.

Question: A bank offers you a new, premium rewards card with better perks. Do you apply for it?

Apply.Text: Apply for the new rewards card.

Don't Apply.Text: Keep your current credit card setup.

Question: You've found your dream home! Do you choose a fixed-rate mortgage or an adjustable-rate mortgage (ARM)?

Fixed-rate mortgage.Text: Choose a fixed-rate mortgage for stable payments.

Adjustable-Rate Mortgage (ARM).Text: Choose an adjustable-rate mortgage (ARM) with variable payments.

Question: You're deciding how much to put down as a down payment. Do you go for the traditional 20%, a smaller 5%, or a larger 30% down payment?

30% Down Payment.Text: Make a larger 30% down payment for reduced debt.

Question: You receive an offer to refinance your mortgage at a lower interest rate. Do you proceed with the refinance or stay with your current mortgage?

Refinance.Text: Refinance your mortgage to secure a lower interest rate.

Stay with Current Mortgage.Text: Stay with your current mortgage terms.
